role.argrole: for what? (marked by ل or إلى)

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC الطوافات) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC العسكرية)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC التابعة) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لجيش))))) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM مضطرة) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التوقف)))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN هبوط) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الليل))))))))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))
